name: Rest (itch) (Saschanian)
description:
Rest is a small puzzle game centered around dreams. You go to sleep to wake up in a new dream where you have to solve problems to be able to escape.

The game is a very early prototype and mostly does not work.

Known bugs are:

- Falling through the floor

-Not being able to pick up items (every door opens after a certain amount of time should this occur)

Controls:

AWSD to walk

Shift to sprint

Space to skip wake up animation

E to interact

V to activate monocle view
